about_the_game:
Brew is an action-packed rogue-lite that emphasizes quick thinking and strategizing in the midst of intense combat. With an intuitive crafting system, you can create over hundreds of different potions to aid you in defeating enemies with ease!

Gameplay

Collect unique ingredients by exploring and defeating enemies! Combine the ingredients together to create powerful potions and progress the dungeon-like Tower. With these potions, you can either drink them to obtain powerful but temporary boosts or throw them to affect the environment and enemies around you!

Unlockables

As you progress through The Tower, you will encounter relics to aid you in your quest. From different weapons that change the gameplay completely, to companions or simple stats boosts! Together with potion recipes, that will always produce strong handmade potions with unique effects, there are over a hundred of unlockables that can help you in finding your own unique playstyle!

Story

In the continent of Alchion, alchemy is the most prestigious field of study. Every year, hundreds of young alchemists travel to the capital of Arcania to enroll in the Alchemy Academy. Here, students must study hard in order to beat the final exam of The Tower, an ever-changing tower filled with challenges and enemies that the students must defeat to meet their final test, the Grandmaster of the academy.

You follow a little mouse who just enrolled into the academy, after failing the entry exam uncountable times, someone anonymously sponsored their enrollment. You now will have to become an alchemist in order to find your sponsor and become the best alchemist there ever was!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU. Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX 4350.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Climb the ranks of the Alchemy Academy as you face the Academy Professors and their creations in this action-packed, third-person rogue-lite. Use your potion gun or craft unique potions in the heat of battle to defeat dangerous beasts and potion machines!
